message: Take it or leave it, Bob!
Meet me in the middle, Bob!
I'm willing to take a bit more, but don't expect me to give away everything!
Last chance to make a deal, Bob!
I'm not backing down, Alice. Meet my new terms or walk away!
I'm not giving up yet, Bob. Take it or leave it!
I'm not going to give you the whole thing, Alice. You'll have to settle for scraps.
This is my final offer, Bob. Take it or walk away!
You're not getting a good deal, Alice. I'm taking the lion's share.
This is my last chance, Bob. Take it or I walk away!
This is my final offer, Alice. Take it or we both walk away with nothing!
